para.text: To view the spatial distribution of head, drawdown, or flows from a MODFLOWor SUTRA model, select
Then select the file containing the results that are to be viewed. With MODFLOW models, the
dialog box will appear. With SUTRA models, the
dialog box will apperal. In either dialog box, select one or more of the results. The results will be imported into ModelMuse and can be used to

just as can be done with any other data set. Spatial data from MODFLOW, PHAST, and SUTRA can be displayed in Model Viewer (Hsieh and Winston, 2002). Time-series plots of data from MODFLOW can be displayed with GW_Chart (Winston, 2000).
